title: FS2004-FSX(SP) Lionheart Socata & Trinidad Collection Build 2
description:
Lionheart Creations Socata & Trinidad Collection Build 2
 <a href="
http://secure.simmarket.com/product_info.php?products_id=2108" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://secure.simmarket.com/product_info.php?products_id=2108</a>

This aircraft is built for FS9 and FSX (SP1 only).

FSX-support is available only for FSX-SP1. This product does not support FSX with SP2.


This package contains two high detail aircraft with elaborate Virtual Cockpits moderate animations through out. The aircraft come in 12 lliveries each and are created from existing actual aircraft and factory paint schemes.

With guidance from actual Socata pilots and owners, extreme attention to details and animations within the exotic &#039;virtual cockpit&#039;, the Socata &#039;Experience&#039; sets out to be an awesome and fun aircraft flight simulation package. Designed and tested in and for FS2004 and FSX.

Model Details

    * Opening Gullwing Pilot and Passenger doors
    * Opening Rear Cargo door
    * Animated pilot that scans the horizon and instrument panel
    * Factory paint schemes from actual aircraft, 26 total between both models
    * Dynamic reflective 32 Bit high resolution exterior paint schemes
    * Detail Virtual Cockpit that features;
    * Moving control yokes that can hide for better visibility
    * Animated Engine Controls, rudder trim, fuel control knob, etc
    * Animated Passenger Seat, Ash tray, Rear Seat Arm Rest, animated Rudder Pedals, and dual directional Sun Visors as well.
    * Functioning suspension with high detail components replication on the RG model
    * High detail propellor modelling
    * Tinted side glass as in the actual TB aircraft line
    * Highly realistic airfile set that reflects each of the two different aircrafts flight characteristics and performance.
    * Animated Cowling that removes to allow you to see the extremely high detail Lycoming engine
    * FS9 KeyPad Quick Views that allow Belly-Cam view, Rudder-Cam view, Oil Check View, etc.

	
Enjoy and keep seeding after downloading
